# FactorioLazyBastard
Detailing Guide to my own run of Lazy Bastard (<111 crafts) for Factorio

## Setup

## Map Seed
My seed that I use for settings per [Nilaus guide](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Biz_dVyoue8)

## Crafted Items

### 1 Boiler
### 1 Steam Engine
### 1 Offshore Pump
### 1 Lab
### 1 Small Electric Pole
### 10 Science Pack 1

- [x] Create Rep/ init guide

- [ ] Main Bus
